au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L18m_L2=1.3m_offset
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(510,300) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 38.3) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.2)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41, 0) driveBsz(261)
